title: Mayor Durkan & local leadership hold media briefing on SR 99 closure
description:
Mayor Durkan and regional leaders give brief remarks and answer questions ahead of the permanent closure of the Alaskan Way Viaduct on January 11 and the beginning of the "Seattle Squeeze."
Speakers include:
Mayor Jenny Durkan
Mike O'Brien, Seattle City Council
Sam Zimbabwe, Seattle Department of Transportation (SDOT) 
Roger Millar, Washington State Department of Transportation (WSDOT) 
Rob Gannon, King County Metro 
Michael Worden, City of Seattle
Heather Marx, SDOT Director of Downtown Mobility
